reviewText:
I bought this because it was very discounted. But unfortunately the dvd is cheaply produced and edited, so you won't get to see the movements as you should. Also the instructor is very dull and boring to watch, so definitly you won't be watching this video more than once (if so).
Adding to this, the dvd came scratched and won't play. Very poor product.
This is very similar to other self defense courses that I have taken. It has good information, but there are places that do not describe procedures as well as they should.
